CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1959, pg. 2 reads: "Surviving Brothers - Seven-year-old Robert (left) and eight-year-old Samuel, both members of the Robert L. Fletcher family of which the father and three other members lost their lives in a Christmas night fire, are shown recovering in Braddock General Hospital. -Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Seven-year-old Robert Fletcher, heavily bandaged from burns, lying in hospital bed, and brother Samuel Fletcher, gathered in Braddock General Hospital
